title: The Keeper of Secrets
description: Trapped in an alternate dimension. Hunted by a sadist. With no magic of her own, can she escape her relentless pursuer and get back to Earth?Amanda Covington is desperate for a miracle. After she and her fiancé are hijacked from the Bermuda Triangle by a sudden electrical storm, the sheltered eighteen-year-old wakes up in another universe with amnesia and a stranger claiming to be her husband. Refusing to give in until she reclaims her memories, she breaks free of her abusive captor and flees into the foreign land.Stumbling across unexpected help, Amanda is shocked to discover everyone else has powers, and she could be exposed as an ungifted outsider and enslaved by authorities. Barely keeping ahead of her ruthless stalker and his cruel plans for her, she fears any wrong step will make her a prisoner in this world… forever.Can Amanda find her way to freedom before the door to her old life slams shut?The Keeper of Secrets is the compelling first book in the Chosen Origins portal fantasy series. If you like tales of courage, gripping self-discovery, and eye-opening twists, then you’ll love Amy Proebstel and Bethany Hall’s well-crafted page-turner.Discover The Keeper of Secrets to cross to the other side today!
author: Amy Proebstel
